author: Sophie Dainty
title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Mercedes McQueen wants to flee with Freddie Roscoe - Hollyoaks Soaps -
text: Hollyoaks' Mercedes McQueen will make Freddie Roscoe a proposition next week as he starts to consider a life without his wife Lindsey.Freddie and Lindsey's troubled marriage will be hit by further problems as her sister Kim vows to split them up for good.At the start of the week, Freddie (Charlie Clapham) is shocked to discover that Lindsey is taking a pregnancy test and questions whether she was going to tell him. © Lime PicturesCharlie Clapham as Freddie Roscoe Furious that Kim knew before him, Freddie tells Lindsey about his dreams of a new life in the country away from Kim, before suggesting that she needs to move out.Kim is furious when Lindsey tells her she needs to leave and immediately surmises that Freddie is to blame.After going to extensive efforts to win her sister over, Kim is furious by Lindsey and Freddie's closeness and vows to break them up for good.Meanwhile, Mercedes is jealous when she walks in on Joe and Lindsey looking cosy but is later left in a predicament when he asks her out on a date. © Lime PicturesJennifer Metcalfe as Mercedes McQueen As she ponders whether to go on a date with Joe, Mercedes is given food for thought when Freddie tells her that he's moving to Valencia to work in his friend's bar. Unsure over whether she wants to spend her life with Joe, Mercedes asks Freddie if she can go with him. What will he say? And does this mean that Kim has managed to get her way?Hollyoaks airs these scenes next week on Channel 4.Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ben and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Aaron's Emmerdale arrest, important news for Fiz and Tyrone in Coronation Street and a shock kidnapping in Hollyoaks. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4532176223001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14532176223001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4532176223001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4532176223001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14532176223001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4532176223001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Get the Inside Soap magazine on your iPhone or iPad
